snippet: How many words can YOU find in Will Shortz's 3-D Word Hunt?
abstract: How many words can YOU find in Will Shortz's 3-D Word Hunt?
lead_paragraph: SECOND SUNDAY PUZZLE - There's not a lot to say here, although I know some of you look forward to the 3-D Word Hunt and some of you prefer other Variety Puzzles. How many words did you find? I've listed the answers according to Will Shortz after the jump, so if you're not done solving, don't click through just yet. Give it one more try!
